UsageCmtAssetRelatedObj.name: UsageCmtAssetRelatedObj
UsageCmtAssetRelatedObj.description: Represents the relation between an asset for the commitment-based usage product and an asset, account, contract, or custom object.

AssetId.description: The asset associated with the commitment-based usage product.

EffectiveEndDateTime.description: The date and time until when the commitment for the related asset remains effective.

EffectiveStartDateTime.description: The date and time when the commitment for the related asset becomes effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Autogenerated identifier for the usage commitment asset related object record.

RelatedObjectId.description: The asset, account, or contract associated with the asset.
